page.title: 06WELSH CHAPEL IN NANTGLYN 2
page.content: Important chapel events are visits to the Methodist centre at Trefecca, Brecon.Farming families rarely get a long holiday but sometimes a weekend at this religious centre brings them together.Two or 3 families go each year with those from other chapels. The centre is also used for a 5 day devotional visit for the older chapel members.For many this is the only holiday they have. The minister takes the young children to a local field centre for a week. In the mornings Bible Study or project work is done.Afternoons are for walking fishing and swimming.In the evenings visitors and parents come along to help with discussion groups. Older children go to the seaside village of Tresaeth where they join children from a mining community in Ammanford.
